titleStmt.title: Taylor his trauels: from the citty of London in England, to the citty of Prague in Bohemia The manner of his abode there three weekes, his obseruations there, and his returne from thence: how he past 600 miles downe the riuer of Elue, through Bohemia, Saxony, Anhalt, the bishoprick of Madeberge, Brandenberge, Hamburgh, and so to England. With many relations worthy of note. By Iohn Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

titleStmt.title: Taylor his trauels: from the citty of London in England, to the citty of Prague in Bohemia The manner of his abode there three weekes, his obseruations there, and his returne from thence: how he past 600 miles downe the riuer of Elue, through Bohemia, Saxony, Anhalt, the bishoprick of Madeberge, Brandenberge, Hamburgh, and so to England. With many relations worthy of note. By Iohn Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Henry Gosson, and are to bee sold by Edward Wright,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Taylors trauells to Bohemia.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
